name: Webex by Cisco Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Webex by Cisco Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Cisco Webex API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Cisco Webex API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Meeting (值: meeting)
Message (值: message)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create)
Delete (值: delete)
Get (值: get)
Get Many (值: getAll)
Update (值: update)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

title.name: title
title.description: Meeting title. The title can be a maximum of 128 characters long.
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Meeting title. The title can be a maximum of 128 characters long. | (必填项)

start.name: start
start.description: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable  format.
start.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start | 作用: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable  format. | (必填项)

end.name: end
end.description: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable  format.
end.natural_language_description: 参数名: End | 作用: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable  format. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: attachmentsUi (值: None)
fileUi (值: None)
markdown (值: None) - The message in markdown format. When used the text parameter is used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.

meetingId.name: meetingId
meetingId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Meeting ID | 作用: ID of the meeting | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: hostEmail (值: None) - Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

password (值: None) - Meeting password. It's required when the meeting is protected by a password and the current user is not privileged to view it if they are not a host, co-host or invitee of the meeting.
sendEmail (值: None) - Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: before (值: None) - List messages sent before a date and time
beforeMessage (值: None) - List messages sent before a message, by ID
parentId (值: None) - List messages with a parent, by ID
mentionedPeople (值: None) - List only messages with certain person mentioned. Enter their ID. You can use 'me' as a shorthand for yourself

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: agenda (值: None) - The meeting's agenda. Cannot be longer that 1300 characters.
allowAnyUserToBeCoHost (值: None) - Whether or not to allow any attendee with a host account on the target site to become a co-host when joining the meeting
allowAuthenticatedDevices (值: None) - Whether or not to allow authenticated video devices in the meeting's organization to start or join the meeting without a prompt
allowFirstUserToBeCoHost (值: None) - Whether or not to allow the first attendee of the meeting with a host account on the target site to become a co-host
enableConnectAudioBeforeHost (值: None) - Whether or not to allow any attendee to connect audio in the meeting before the host joins the meeting
enabledAutoRecordMeeting (值: None) - Whether or not meeting is recorded automatically
enabledJoinBeforeHost (值: None) - Whether or not to allow any attendee to join the meeting before the host joins the meeting
end (值: None) - Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable  format.
excludePassword (值: None) - Whether or not to exclude password from the meeting email invitation
hostEmail (值: None) - Email address for the meeting host. This attribute should only be set if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.
inviteesUi (值: None)
joinBeforeHostMinutes (值: None) - The number of minutes an attendee can join the meeting before the meeting start time and the host joins

password (值: None) - Meeting password. Must conform to the site's password complexity settings. If not specified, a random password conforming to the site's password rules will be generated automatically
publicMeeting (值: None) - Whether or not to allow the meeting to be listed on the public calendar
recurrence (值: None) - Meeting series recurrence rule (conforming with RFC 2445), applying only to meeting series
requireRegistrationInfo (值: None) - Data required for meeting registration
reminderTime (值: None) - The number of minutes before the meeting begins, for sending an email reminder to the host
sendEmail (值: None) - Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.

siteUrl (值: None) - URL of the Webex site which the meeting is created on. If not specified, the meeting is created on user's preferred site. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
start (值: None) - Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable  format.
title (值: None) - Meeting title

destination.name: destination
destination.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination | 默认值: room | (必填项)
available_options: Room (值: room)
Person (值: person)

roomId.name: roomId
roomId.description: List messages in a room, by ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
roomId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Room Name or ID | 作用: List messages in a room, by ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

specifyPersonBy.name: specifyPersonBy
specifyPersonBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Specify Person By | 默认值: email | (必填项)
available_options: Email (值: email)
ID (值: id)

toPersonId.name: toPersonId
toPersonId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person ID | (必填项)

toPersonEmail.name: toPersonEmail
toPersonEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person Email | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The message, in plain text | (必填项)

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: ID of the message to update
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: ID of the message to update | (必填项)

markdown.name: markdown
markdown.natural_language_description: 参数名: Is Markdown | 作用: Whether the message uses markdown | 默认值: False | (必填项)

markdownText.name: markdownText
markdownText.description: The message, in Markdown format. The maximum message length is 7439 bytes.
markdownText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Markdown | 作用: The message, in Markdown format. The maximum message length is 7439 bytes. | (必填项)
